page.title: 12REDLAND ROOF TILES L.BUZZARD
page.content: One of the main industries in the area. Opened in 1979 as the most advanced plant of it kind in the world. Redland has been improving the quality and range of concrete roof tiles since 1919 and is the world's largest manufacturer, exporting to over 25 countries, tiles of varied colour,size and texture to meet all building needs. The Vandyke factory on a 40,000m2 site in Mile Tree Road exhibits some of its products in the buildings. Production at the works is planned to allow manufacture in a highly automated & controlled process. Quality control is highlighted throughout the process to ensure that strength and appearance standards are maintained. The factory employs almost 100 people, working a double shift system. It owns about 17 vehicles.
